snippet: ANGELO--John M. The Board of Directors, Volunteers, and Staff of the Ronald McDonald House of New York wish to express our sincere sympathy of the passing of our dear friend and benefactor, John M. Angelo. John dutifully served as a member of the Board of Directors of our charity from 2005 to 2014 when he became a Member at Large. He was both generous and kind to the special kids and families battling cancer at the Ronald McDonald House. Our sincere sympathy and deepest condolences go out to his dear wife, Judy, his children, and the entire Angelo family. Respectfully, Tina Lundgren, Chairman of the Board; Harris Diamond, Vice Chair, Chairman Elect; Stanley B. Shopkorn, Chairman, Emeritus; Joel Newman Interim President & Chief Executive Officer, Ronald McDonald House New York 1/3
